name: Slashers (itch)
description:
A remake of the Action 52 game, originally for the Action 52 remake project headed up by independent developer Arthur "Podunkian" Lee. Unfinished, and will likely remain that way.

Programming, design, and some art by Tegiminis
Additional art and design by Danrul

Arrow keys to move
Z to enter combat stance
C to jump

Experiment with combinations of keys to discover secret techniques. Find the hidden money bags and make it to the level exit.
